description:
Unlike the Snap version, this version does not have a broken password import dialog which has a broken charset in the Snap version. 

I also hope that I do not need to enter my master password on every single login which is quite frustrating and made me look at Bitwarden as an alternative. Damn! Let the users decide how much security they deem appropriate!
summary: Despite some drawbacks my password manager of choice at the moment

description: I like NordPass in general, have had it for over a year, and I enjoy the product. Tried LastPass at work for a week and couldn't stand it. However, the flatpak version seems to be absolutely buggered. Every 5ish minutes the version crashes, meanwhile the snap version on my other laptop seems to run fine. I would prefer the flatpak version, but I may have to get snap just for my NordPass.
It's a nice app but sadly it keeps on crashing when working in the background.
summary: Nice app but stopped working properly

description:
It prompts for my master password every time I try to use the app. It feels like the program is crashing in the background every five minutes or so.

It's very frustrating

This app is completely unusuable. Keeps crashing and requiring you to setup again. Stuck in login loops. You have to install the app to use the browser extension. You need a browser to login to the app. Loging in the the browser succeeds, but you just return to the login screen on the app afterwards.
summary: Keeps crashing and requiring you to setup again. Stuck in login loops

description: Nordpass is a great application, however, the flatpak version does not seem to be working as it should. It appear to crash in the background every 5-10 min. When reopening the app it will completely log you out and prompt you to enter your email to verify your account. Switched to snap version because it runs as it should.
summary: Wish it worked as it should

description: App Crashes every few minutes, today I could not open the application.
summary: Crashing and unable to open app

description: Ne fonctionne pas du tout pour moi avec Tumbleweed.
